data.instructions: Provide info to match with a survey.,Complete survey to get rewarded or begin answering a few profiling questions to get better matched with surveys.,Complete survey & get your reward.,If there is no match come back & try again.,Redeem your points!
data.description: Complete surveys everyday for more rewards! Multiple surveys available. Earn Now!
data.disclaimer: Disqualified users phased out from a specific survey will not receive credit.

data.name: QuickThoughts
data.instructions: Open QuickThoughts,Register with VALID information,Complete your profile,Finish first survey,Redeem your points! *New Users Only!
data.description: QuickThoughts gets your opinions heard through quick, easy surveys.

data.name: Cdiscount
data.instructions: Téléchargez l'application et estimez le montant sur votre mobile.,Échangez vos points! *Nouveaux utilisateurs uniquement!
data.description: Looking for the best deals? Welcome to Cdiscount.
